title: Sor Juana Ines de la Cruz--iconographic meaning

content.question: The specific iconography used by Miguel Cabrera in his portrayal of Sor Juana Inés de la Cruz suggests the artist’s intention to

choices.label: emphasize her passion for religion and love of literature
reference her translation of the Bible into Spanish
endow the painting with symbolism connected to the Virgin of Guadalupe
remind the viewer of her martyrdom and designation as a patron saint of learning

content.answer: emphasize her passion for religion and love of literature
